name: Space Battle (itch) (HuskiGames)
description:
Made in 3 hours for the #160th Trijam with the theme:

Don't turn it off How does my game fit the theme?

In the game, you have to turn off the enemy ships but don't turn off the blue ships

Objective 

destroy all the red ships

How To Play

Click on a ship to turn off its ability to turn, sending it plummeting towards a wall. Be careful though, clicking on a blue ship will also turn off its ability to turn and make you lose a heart

Known Bugs
  • sometimes the will be enemy ships left after a round.
  • Very rarely the round will not end when you destroy all the enemy ships
